name: Uninspired One-Button Shooter
description:
Made in 1 hour 43 minutes for RigidJam9.

All valid buttons map to the same input.

The theme was "one button". The idea is that you hold the button to shoot, but you need to press it to change the direction your ship moves vertically.

Pretty uninspired, but I'm happy that it has both a game-over state and a win-state.

Here's a video of me making this game:
